com.facebook.buck.jvm.java

Class JUnitJvmArgs

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.jvm.java.JUnitJvmArgs

  • @ParametersAreNonnullByDefault
 @Generated(value={"Immutables.generator","AbstractJUnitJvmArgs"})
 @Immutable
public final class JUnitJvmArgs
extends Object
    Holds and formats the arguments and system properties that should be passed to the JVM to run JUnit.
